"A.D.2028/3/23/12:00": "Waaa!!... This is irresistible!! Moreso than I could ever have imagined!"
"Aru! Face this way for me! Just like that! Now do a twirl!"
"...Big sis, I want to take these off... It's stuffy."
"No. Deal with it."
"I want to wear clothes like yours, Big sis!"
"You're a boy."
"A girly one at that!"
"Shut it, Kohri."
"Just keep it on. It really suits you anyway."
"Mmm...okay. Since you picked it out for me, I'll bear with it."
"Kohri picked these out, not me. ...Come to think of it, you're really good at picking out clothes."
"Oh, it's hardly praiseworthy! All I have to do is search on Ether. First you do this, then that... and voila!"
"Just type in the height, age and your budget, it'll automatically pick a match for you!"
"All of this is made possible with YMT Corporation app called \"Trend Creation\". Amazing, isn't it?"
"...Oh. Never knew we had this."
"Typical Hitsugi, you've never had any interest in fashion. I picked the clothes you're wearing with this, remember?"
"I'd choose a good book over fashion any day of the week if you ask me."
"Come on Hitsugi! Youth is all about food, games, and fashion! You need to live it while you're in it!"
"That would sound perfect if you leave fashion out of it."
"Hey, what's this?"
"This is an Ether Communication app. I used this to find the place to choose and buy your clothes."
"Check this out."
"Woah... That's amazing! I'm on that tiny screen! ...And I'm moving too!"
"But wait, there's more! After putting on the clothes, you can turn and view yourself 360 degrees. How convenient!"
"\"My Favorite Layout\"... What is this??"
"Oh, feast your eyes!"
"I'm wearing the same clothes as Big sis... I want to wear this too!"
"Geez... This looks an awful lot similar to the character creation on PSO2, don't you think?"
"Y-yeah, I suppose you're right. Since PSO2 was integrated with the Ether network when it was created, maybe they used it as reference?"
"...Big sis, I'm hungry."
"Oh. Come to think of it, it's about lunch time, huh? Great timing! Let's go find somewhere to grab a bite."
"Ahem! Leave it to moi! With my phone and my highly-evolved app, it shall be naught but a breezeful stroll!"
"Sounds like you're addicted. Smartphone addiction? Wait, make it Ether addiction."
"Nonono, it's not like that! I'm too cute to be addicted to anything!"
"I mean, people around the world are dependent upon Ether for so much these days. Labelling it an addiction is overdoing it."
"...You know, at this point, the world would be hard-pressed to survive without it."
"Mhmm... And bingo, I have found and reserved our lunch arrangements!"
"That world mainly manufactures low-end technology, but their communication technology is top-notch!"
"Their communication speed and infrastructure environments are comparable to ARKS's very own!"
"I feel something fishy. It's like a forced evolution, almost as if it were part of some greater scheme..."
